Package org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator

Class BoundedPortfolioConstructionParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.PortfolioConstructionParameters
      • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.BoundedPortfolioConstructionParameters
  • public class BoundedPortfolioConstructionParameters
extends PortfolioConstructionParameters
    BoundedPortfolioConstructionParameters holds the Parameters needed to build the Portfolio with Bounds on the Underlying Assets.

    • Module = Portfolio Core Module
    • Library = Asset Allocation Analytics Library
    • Project = Portfolio Construction
    • Package = Allocator
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
